languages.text: "Виновница нашего заточения, Вил'Ирлиэт! Твоя связь с ней — одна из причин того, что мы не узрели предательства! И ей ты доверяешь свою тень? Ей ты позволяешь дышать тем же воздухом, что дышим мы?"

traits.locale_text: "Виновница нашего заточения, Тэй'Ирлиэт! Твоя связь с ней — одна из причин того, что мы не узрели предательства! И ей ты доверяешь свою тень? Ей ты позволяешь дышать тем же воздухом, что дышим мы?"

languages.text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"
languages.original_text: "Виновница нашего заточения, Вил'Ирлиэт! Твоя связь с ней — одна из причин того, что мы не узрели предательства! И ей ты доверяешь свою тень? Ей ты позволяешь дышать тем же воздухом, что дышим мы?"

traits.locale_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Tei'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air as we?"

"The very orchestrator of our capture, Tei'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air as we?"

"The very orchestrator of our capture, Tei'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

"The very orchestrator of our capture, Tei'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

"The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

"The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

languages.text: «¡La mismísima responsable de nuestra captura, Vil'Yrliet! ¡El vínculo que comparten es una de las razones por las que fuimos incapaces de prever su traición! ¿Y usted le confiaría su sombra? ¿Permitirá que respire el mismo aire que nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

traits.locale_text: «¡La mismísima responsable de nuestra captura, Vil'Yrliet! ¡El vínculo que comparten es una de las razones por las que fuimos incapaces de prever su traición! ¿Y usted le confiaría su sombra? ¿Permitirá que respire el mismo aire que nosotros?».

languages.text: 「私たちを陥れた黒幕、ユリエット！裏切りを予見できなかった理由のひとつがその絆よ！なのに、あなたは自分の影を彼女に託すというの？同じ空気を吸わせるの？」
languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちを陥れた黒幕、ユリエット！裏切りを予見できなかった理由のひとつがその絆よ！なのに、あなたは自分の影を彼女に託すというの？同じ空気を吸わせるの？」

languages.text: “敌者伊莉耶特，她就是害得我们落入险境的幕后黑手！正是由于你们之间的纽带，我们才没能预见这场背叛！可你却把你的影子托付给她？允许她和我们一样自由呼吸？”
languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

traits.locale_text: “敌者伊莉耶特，她就是害得我们落入险境的幕后黑手！正是由于你们之间的纽带，我们才没能预见这场背叛！可你却把你的影子托付给她？允许她和我们一样自由呼吸？”

languages.text: "Die Koordinatorin unserer Ergreifung, Vil'Yrliet! Euer Band ist nur einer der Gründe, warum wir den Verrat nicht vorhersehen konnten! Und ihr würdet Ihr Euren Schatten anvertrauen? Sie dieselbe Luft atmen lassen wie wir?"
languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Koordinatorin unserer Ergreifung, Vil'Yrliet! Euer Band ist nur einer der Gründe, warum wir den Verrat nicht vorhersehen konnten! Und ihr würdet Ihr Euren Schatten anvertrauen? Sie dieselbe Luft atmen lassen wie wir?"

languages.text: « L'instigatrice de notre enlèvement, Vil'Yrliet ! Votre lien est l'une des raisons pour lesquelles nous n'avons pas vu venir cette trahison ! Et pourtant, vous la laisseriez vous suivre comme votre ombre et respirer le même air que nous ? »
languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

traits.locale_text: « L'instigatrice de notre enlèvement, Vil'Yrliet ! Votre lien est l'une des raisons pour lesquelles nous n'avons pas vu venir cette trahison ! Et pourtant, vous la laisseriez vous suivre comme votre ombre et respirer le même air que nous ? »

languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"

languages.text: "Mahkûm düşmemizin sorumlusu olan Vil'Yrliet! Bu ihaneti öngöremememizin nedenlerinden biri de aranızdaki bağ! O kadına güvenip arkanı döner miydin? Bizimle aynı havayı solumasına göz yumar mıydın?"
languages.original_text: "The very orchestrator of our capture, Vil'Yrliet! Your bond is but one of the reasons why we couldn't foresee the betrayal! And you would trust her with your shadow? Let her breathe the same air we do?"
